package Assignment;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Scanner;


public class Program31{
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		HashMap<Integer,String> hash=new HashMap<Integer,String>();
		
		hash.put(1,"Tintu");
		hash.put(3,"Riya");
		hash.put(2,"Diya");
		hash.put(5,"Oviya");
		hash.put(4,"Lily");
		
		System.out.println("Original HashMap is : "+hash);
		
		System.out.println("Collection View of The Values Contained in a Map is : "+hash.values());
		
	}

}
